docs.summary: A collection of IConfig objects.
Returns the number of IConfigs in the collection.
Returns the IConfig at the specified index.
Returns true if the collection is synchronized. This always returns false.
Returns true if the collection is of a fixed size.
Returns true if the collection is read only.
Returns the synchronization object.
Returns the IConfig by name.
Adds a new IConfig to the collection.
Adds a new IConfig to the collection.
docs.param: The name of the IConfig to add.

docs.summary: Inserts a new IConfig to the collection.
docs.param: The index of the collection to insert the IConfig.

docs.summary: Removes an IConfig from the collection.
Removes an IConfig from the index.
Removes all IConfigs from the collection.
Returns true if the collection contains the IConfig.
Returns the index of an IConfig in the collection.
docs.remarks: It returns -1 if the IConfig was not found.

docs.summary: Returns the enumerator object.
Copies the collection to an array.
docs.param: Index of the array to start copying.

docs.summary: Copies the collection to a strongly-typed array.
docs.param: The IConfig array to copy the results.
Index of the array to start copying.

docs.summary: Raises the event.
docs.remarks: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
docs.param: The EventArgs object that contains all event data.

docs.summary: Raises the event.
docs.remarks: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
docs.param: The EventArgs object that contains all event data.

docs.summary: Occurs when a config is added.
Occurs when a config is removed.
